name: When They Come to Your Door
name_original: When They Come to Your Door
description:
Realtime binaural hyptext coming of age adventure horror game about real world horrors. Made for USC Experimental Game Design - the "Activist" experiment

NOTE: SOUND IS IMPORTANT

If sound assets fail to initialize at start after 30-60sec seconds on the start page, reload and try again on a different browser. Seems to work best with Firefox or Chrome. You should hear a shower. If you do, the rest of the sound effects will load properly.
